Items.Title: Oversight - Hunger and Food Insecurity in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Hunger and Food Insecurity in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a universal benefits application for city benefits and codifying Access NYC, and to repeal section 3-119.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to a study on notification of public assistance eligibility
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a universal benefits application for city benefits and codifying Access NYC, and to repeal section 3-119.3 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to a study on notification of public assistance eligibility.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to automatic enrollment of eligible individuals in city-created benefit programs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Automatic enrollment of eligible individuals in city-created benefit programs

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of social services to provide an application confirmation notice and document receipts for applications for benefits
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of social services to provide an application confirmation notice and document receipts for applications for benefits.
